{"link":"https://u.sanwen.net/douban/login","html":"<head> \n    <meta charset=\"utf-8\"> \n    <title>登录豆瓣</title> \n    <meta name=\"viewport\" content=\"width=device-width,initial-scale=1,minimum-scale=1,maximum-scale=1\"> \n    <style type=\"text/css\"> \n      body,h1,p { padding:0;margin:0; }\n      body { font:normal 12px/1.4 arial,sans-serif;color:#333;background:#eaeff3; }\n      em { font-style:normal; }\n      p em { color:#188414; }\n      a { text-decoration:none; }\n      a:link { color:#369; }\n      a:visited { color:#669; }\n      a:hover { color:#fff;background:#039; }\n      a:active { color:#fff;background:#f93; }\n      .hd { padding:20px;border-top:30px solid #ebf5ea;background:#fff; }\n      .bd { background:#fff; }\n      .intro { padding:0 20px;margin-bottom:20px; }\n      .item { padding-left:20px;margin-bottom:12px; }\n      .item input { padding:5px;width:12em;font-size:14px;border:1px solid #ccc;-webkit-appearance:none;-webkit-border-radius:3px;border-radius:3px; }\n      .item label { float:left;width:40px;line-height:2.8; }\n      .item:after { content:'\\0020';display:block;clear:both; } \n      .submit { margin-top:20px;background:#eaeff3;border-top:1px solid #d9e2e9;padding:20px 0 20px 60px; }\n      .submit input { padding:5px 20px;margin-right:20px;-webkit-appearance:none;font-size:13px;-webkit-border-radius:3px;border-radius:3px; }\n      .submit input[type=submit] { background:#3da247;border:1px solid #538730;color:#fff;font-weight:800;  }\n      .submit input[type=button] {\n        border:1px solid #b0b0b0;\n        background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #fff 0%, #e2e2e2 100%); /* firefox */\n        background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%,#fff), color-stop(100%,#e2e2e2)); /* webkit */\n        background: -o-linear-gradient(top, #fff 0%,#e2e2e2 100%); /* opera */\n      }\n        .logo { width:129px;height:25px;overflow:hidden;line-height:10em;background:url(data:image/png;base64,) no-repeat; }\n        .accounts { color:#666;margin:0 0 60px 20px; }\n        .error { padding-left:60px;margin-bottom:10px;color:#d92616; }\n    </style> \n  </head> \n  <body> \n    <div class=\"wrapper\"> \n      <div class=\"hd\"> \n        <div class=\"logo\">豆瓣</div> \n      </div> \n \n      <div class=\"bd\"> \n      <p class=\"intro\">\n      第三方应用 <b>散文网</b> 请求连到你的豆瓣帐号。\n\t</p><ul>\n    \n        <em><li>豆瓣公共api</li></em>\n    \n        <em><li>读书基本读功能，包括获取书籍信息，评论等</li></em>\n    \n        <em><li>读书基本写功能，包括发布、修改、删除读书评论</li></em>\n    \n        <em><li>修改你的个人信息、好友关系; 发布或修改你的广播</li></em>\n    \n        <em><li>豆瓣社区日记功能</li></em>\n\t</ul>\n      <p></p>\n      <p class=\"intro\"><a href=\"https://developers.douban.com/wiki/?title=terms\" target=\"_blank\">豆瓣开放平台服务条款</a></p>\n      <div class=\"error\"></div>\n\n    \n    <form id=\"refuse_form\" method=\"post\" action=\"?response_type=code&amp;client_id=0d10fc424fca891e2732f4c6ef5f9b5a&amp;redirect_uri=http%3A%2F%2Fu.sanwen.net%2Fdouban%2Fcallback&amp;scope=douban_basic_common%2Cbook_basic_r%2Cbook_basic_w%2Cshuo_basic_w%2Ccommunity_basic_note&amp;state=\">\n        <input type=\"hidden\" name=\"refuse\" value=\"1\">\n    </form>\n\n    <form method=\"post\" action=\"?response_type=code&amp;client_id=0d10fc424fca891e2732f4c6ef5f9b5a&amp;redirect_uri=http%3A%2F%2Fu.sanwen.net%2Fdouban%2Fcallback&amp;scope=douban_basic_common%2Cbook_basic_r%2Cbook_basic_w%2Cshuo_basic_w%2Ccommunity_basic_note&amp;state=\">\n      <div class=\"item\">\n        <label for=\"inp-alias\">帐号</label>\n        <input id=\"inp-alias\" name=\"user_alias\" type=\"text\" size=\"24\" maxlength=\"60\" value=\"邮箱/手机号\" style=\"color: rgb(204, 204, 204);\">\n      </div> \n      <div class=\"item\"> \n        <label for=\"inp-pwd\">密码</label>\n        <input id=\"inp-pwd\" name=\"user_passwd\" type=\"password\" size=\"10\" maxlength=\"20\" value=\"\">\n      </div> \n\n      <div class=\"item\">没有豆瓣帐号？<a href=\"https://www.douban.com/accounts/register\">注册豆瓣</a></div>\n      <div class=\"submit\">\n        <input type=\"submit\" name=\"confirm\" value=\"授权\">\n        <input type=\"button\" value=\"拒绝\" onclick=\"javascript:document.forms['refuse_form'].submit();\">\n      </div> \n    </form> \n    </div>\n  </div>\n\n<script>\n;(function(doc){\nvar $ = function(id) { return doc.getElementById(id); };\nvar placeholder = '邮箱/手机号';\nvar alias = $('inp-alias'), password = $('inp-pwd');\n    alias.onfocus = function(){\n      if ( this.value == placeholder ) {\n        this.value = '';\n        this.style.color = '#000';\n      }\n    };\n    alias.onblur = function(){\n      if (!this.value) {\n        this.value = placeholder;\n        this.style.color = '#ccc';\n      }\n    };\n\n  if (alias.value == placeholder) {\n    alias.style.color = '#ccc';\n  } else if(password.value === '') {\n    password.focus();\n  }\n\n})(document);\n\n\n</script>\n\n\n</body>"}
